column4: I have a graphics card problem when I boot that leaves me with a black screen. I booted in limited graphics mode but can not reset graphics setting to default. help?
What is the name of the graphics card you have?
here is a thread that seems relevant - http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1419962
You should note that if you change any system setting file, you should *always* back up your old one
